token.ble51_command_r #title: Clear paired devices on the keyboard (hold down <kt>LCtrl</kt> at the same time)
token.ble51_command_w #title: Turn on Bluetooth function(Short keys: <kt>LShift</kt>+<kt>RShift</kt>+<kt>W</kt>), with <kt>LCtrl</kt> to turn off.
token.ble51_lock_mode #title: Make the keyboard enter the deep power-saving mode and can be only waked up by pressing <kt>F</kt> and <kt>J</kt>.
token.ble51_device_next #title: Switch between Bluetooth devices. It is recommended to pair only two devices. For details, see ydkb.io/help.
token.rgb_mode+ #title: RGB Mode+. While pressing <kt>LShift</kt>, RGB Mode-.
token.fn_tricky_esc #title: Normally it is <kt>Esc</kt>. When <kt>LShift</kt> or <kt>RShift</kt> is holded, it sends <kt>~</kt>.
token.fn_tricky_esc_l #title: Normally it is <kt>Esc</kt>. When <kt>LShift</kt> is holded, it sends <kt>~</kt>.
token.fn_tricky_esc_r #title: Normally it is <kt>Esc</kt>. When <kt>RShift</kt> is holded, it sends <kt>~</kt>.
token.fn_alt_f4 #title: Normally it is <kt>4 $</kt>. When <kt>LAlt</kt> is holded, it sends <kt>Alt+F4</kt>.
token.fn_reset #title: Normally it is clearing the key state. Pressing with <kt>LCtrl</kt> will restart the keyboard.
token.fn_reset_flash #title: Normally it is clearing the key state. Pressing with <kt>LCtrl</kt> will enter the flash mode.
token.fn_win_lock #title: Enable or disable the WIN key lock function. Very useful for gaming.
token.fn_space2 #title: Normally it is <kt>Space</kt>. Pressing with <kt>Shift</kt> it does nothing. This is for some Chinese iput method.
token.fn_up2 #title: Normally it is <kt>Up</kt>. Pressing with <kt>RShift</kt> it does nothing. Prevent accidentally pressing RShift+UP together.
token.部分键盘接蓝牙模块需占用LED灯的IO: Some keyboards use this io for bluetooth module
token.部分键盘使用RGB灯需占用LED灯的IO: Some keyboards use this io for RGB ws2812
token.指示灯亮时为USB连接，不亮时为蓝牙: Led on: USB mode. Led of: bluetooth mode.
token.切换内置USB电源开关: Toggle the power of inner USB port
tabs_readme_content #html: Instructions for this keymap editor
1. Select your keyboard from upper(not top) left corner. If the keyboard supports multiple layouts, click the Circle icon on the left to select your layout.
2. After the selection, through READ KEYMAP, you can choose Upload file to upload your previous downloaded firmware to read its keymap.

3. To set a key, click the key you want to modify, and then Press a key on your hardware keyboard, or select from the virtual keyboard below. For special keys such as FN key, LED lights, multimedia mouse button, and so on, please choose them from the virtual keyboard.

4. When finish your keymap setting, in the upper right corner download dropmenu, click DL .xxx FILE(xxx is the format of the firmware) to download the new firmware. In 'GUIDE AND INFO' tab, there shows how to reflash the current keyboard.
5. In Download dropmenu, through 'Get shared-url' , you can get a long link or short link to save or share your current keymap settings.

regex: 当<kt>层(.*\d+.*)</kt>的状态为开启时，亮起此灯
Light up when <kt>layer $1</kt> is on.
当默认层为<kt>层(.*\d+.*)</kt>时，亮起此灯
Light up when Defalut Layer is <kt>layer $1</kt>.
瞬时开启（按下开启，松开关闭） 层(.*\d+.*)
Turns on layer $1 momentary while holding

长按及与其他键组合时，瞬时开启 层(.*\d+.*)；
快速单击时为(.*\S.*)

Turns on LAYER $1 momentary while holding;
registers KEY[ $2 ] on tap

长按及与其他键组合时：(\S.*) ；
快速单击时为 (\S.*)

Normal KEY[ $2 ] when tapping,
$1 when holding
点击打开或关闭 层(.*\d+.*)
Toggle on layer $1
Jump to layer $1
火力模式按键 (\S.*)
Quickfire Key $1
直接输出标点 (.*), 等效于 (.* \+ .*)
Output symbol $1, equal to $2.

不包含中文
